page.title: Special Event: October 08, 2011 - Learn the Basics of Racing with Joe Sorbera on his Merit 22
page.content:
This is your chance to experience the thrill of sailing with Joe on his Merit 22 shown below. The race starts at 1:30pm on Sat October 8 at Lake Canyon Yatch Club.

In this session, you will learn the timing sequence of the race while you crew for him. You will also learn how to rig a sailboat and the basics of sailing - tacking and jibing. Please call Joe at 830.935.4468 (home) or 210.778.7011 (cell) to sign up.
